data.name: Case 03 : Tokyo Detectives
data.detailed_description:
• Runs on macOS 10.15 Catalina or above (tested on macOS 11.6 Big Sur)

- INCLUDED -

  • Case 03 Complete : Bloodstain on Sailor Uniform

- STORY -

Rin and Nadeshiko are homicide detectives for the Tokyo police.
Find out the killer behind the murder.

- GAMEPLAY -

You will be playing as a homicide detective in charge of murder investigation in Tokyo.
  • Witness questioning
  • Murder scene investigation
  • Interrogation of suspects
  • Rebuttal section

- GENRE -

#Detective Game
#Murder Investigation
#Crime Investigation
#Visual Novel

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP+
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OSX 10.8+
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Linux (most distros should work)
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
